notes: [Added] Added a `highlight` filter.
[Added] Added `sentenceList`, `titleize` and `collapseWhitespace` filters.
[Improved] Improved the performance of the `truncate` filter by removing the ability to properly handle HTML.
[Improved] The old `truncate` filter is now renamed to `truncateHtml`.
[Improved] Changed the order of arguments taken by the `truncate` filter.
[Improved] The `truncate` filter’s `suffix` argument now defaults to `…` (UTF-8 ellipsis character).
[Improved] Removed `removeMultiSpaces` argument from the `stripPunctuation` filter.
[Improved] Removed the PEAR packages dependency in favor of a more actively maintained number-to-words package (used by `numbersToWords` and `currencyToWords` filters).
[Added] Added `readJson`, `readYaml`, `readCsv` and `readPhp` functions to read and convert file contents.
[Added] Added a `readText` function (with alias `inline`) to read an entire file into a string.
[Added] Added `setNotice` and `setError` functions to store messages in the user’s flash data.
[Added] Added a `htmlEntityDecode` filter to convert HTML entities to their applicable characters.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug with the truncateHTML library not being included in the vendor folder.
[Added] Added all the filters and functions from the Truncate and Numbers Convert plugins: `truncate`, `numeralSystem`, `unitPrefix`, `fractionToFloat`, `floatToFraction`.
[Added] Added the following new filters and functions: `numbersToWords`, `currencyToWords`, `randomString`, `md5` and `json_decode`
[Added] The String helpers don’t escape the returned HTML any more by default.
[Added] Added a config setting to escape HTML returned from Twig filters and functions.
[Improved] Improved the `truncate` filter by switching to use the truncateHTML library by Albert Lacarta.
[Improved] The plugin now requires PHP 5.4+.
First release
